EmailTemplate.name: Product field is modified
EmailTemplate.subject: Product {!Product2.SAP_Material_Number__c} field is modified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Product2.Product_Manager_lookup__c},
Your product has been modified {!Product2.SAP_Material_Number__c}. Please verify that your requirements were met by this/these modification(s).
{!ListOfFields}
Best regards, eCommerce Support Team
